title: Johnny’s Bananas
description: A high-strung simian trying to make it in the human world.
quote: I can’t believe you did this Ronald! I’m so screwed!
altHero: Johnny and Ronald are anthropomorphic cartoon monkeys
alt1: after a fender bender with Johnny, the other driver (an orangutan) angrily jumps on the top of his Jeep
alt2: Janet the escort talks with Ronald and his kids
alt3: a neighbor with two pugs stops to chat
alt4: Johnny gets his chicken costume head away from the cat
